thread.title: Math is HARD! Cecile Richards accidentally proves Planned Parenthood isn’t really needed
thread.title_full: Math is HARD! Cecile Richards accidentally proves Planned Parenthood isn’t really needed

author: Sam J.
title: Math is HARD! Cecile Richards accidentally proves Planned Parenthood isn’t really needed
text:
Ok, 105 counties don’t have any other full service birth control clinics, which likely means there is no clinic there to provide abortions. 
Shucky darn. 
Oh and just FYI we looked up the number of counties in this country, and there are THOUSANDS of them. 105 counties is roughly just 3% … seriously. Fact: Most PP health centers offer shorter wait times for initial visits compared to other publicly funded health care providers. 
— Cecile Richards (@CecileRichards) March 18, 2017 
But they don’t offer real care like mammograms; in fact we challenge anyone to try and be seen at a Planned Parenthood clinic for a COLD. 
Sad trombone Cecile, the numbers and FACTS don’t lie. 
Bye bye bye.
